weekly picks (Jul 2 week 2022)

Posted on July 4, 2022 in 2022jul 

A WordCloud of 2022 Jul 2nd week collection

  1. 2207.01774 Hyperbolic fringe signal for twin impurity quasiparticle interference (arXiv)

  2. 2207.01904 Two-stage superconductivity in the Hatsugai-Kohomoto-BCS model (arXiv)

  3. 2207.00284 Spin-hedgehog-derived electromagnetic effects in itinerant magnets (arXiv)

  4. 2207.01638 Topological Mott Insulator at Quarter Filing in the Interacting Haldane Model (arXiv)

  5. 2207.01846 Observation of enhanced spin-spin correlations at triple point in 2D ferromagnetic Cr2X2Te6 (X=Si, Ge) (arXiv)

  6. 2207.01866 Gapped electron liquid state in the symmetric Anderson lattice - Kondo insulator state (Kondo, arXiv)

  7. 2207.02188 Counter-rotating spiral, zigzag, and 120$^\circ$ orders from coupled-chain analysis of Kitaev-Gamma-Heisenberg model, and relations to honeycomb iridates (Kee, arXiv)

  8. PhysRevX.12.031002 Translational Covariance of Flexoelectricity at Ferroelectric Domain Walls (PRX)

  9. PhysRevB.106.014101 High-pressure control of optical nonlinearity in the polar Weyl semimetal TaAs (PRB)

  10. PhysRevB.106.014502 Chiral superconductivity in ${\mathrm{UTe}}{2}$ via emergent ${C}{4}$ symmetry and spin-orbit coupling (PRB)

  11. PhysRevB.106.024503 Quasi-uniaxial pressure induced superconductivity in the stoichiometric compound ${\mathrm{UTe}}_{2}$ (PRB)

  12. PhysRevB.106.024504 Probing superconducting gap of the high-entropy alloy ${\mathrm{Ta}}{1/6}{\mathrm{Nb}}{2/6}{\mathrm{Hf}}{1/6}{\mathrm{Zr}}{1/6}{\mathrm{Ti}}_{1/6}$ via Andreev reflection spectroscopy (PRB)

  13. PhysRevB.106.035105 Higher-order topological semimetals and nodal superconductors with an order-two crystalline symmetry (PRB)

  14. PhysRevB.106.045101 Anomalous Hall effect in the coplanar antiferromagnetic coloring-triangular lattice (PRB)

  15. PhysRevB.106.045102 Resistivity anisotropy from the multiorbital Boltzmann equation in nematic FeSe (nematic, PRB)

  16. PhysRevB.106.045103 Pair-density-wave superconductor from doping Haldane chain and rung-singlet ladder (PRB)

  17. PhysRevB.106.045403 Split-ring resonator coupling-induced tunable acoustic second-order topological insulators (PRB)

  18. PhysRevB.106.L041401 Magnetic resonance of plasmonic modulation and switchable routing in gated graphene waveguides and their robustness and broadband tunability (PRB)

  19. PhysRevB.106.045404 Electromagnetic theory of double Fano resonances in plasmonic nanostructures and metamaterials (PRB)

  20. 2207.00783 Real-space pairing through a confined local nematic state in cuprate superconductors (arXiv)

  21. 2207.00829 SU(2) gauge theory of the pseudogap phase in the two-dimensional Hubbard model (Hubbard model, arXiv)

  22. 2207.01226 Mechanism of Superconductivity: A Theory (arXiv)

  23. 2207.01515 Probing Majorana Bound States via Thermoelectric Transport (majorana, arXiv)

  24. 2207.01541 Evidence against superconductivity in flux trapping experiments on hydrides under high pressure (arXiv)

  25. 2207.00628 Valence Transition Theory of the Pressure-Induced Dimensionality Crossover in Superconducting Sr${14-x}$Ca$_x$Cu${24}$O$_{41}$ (arXiv)

  26. 2207.00629 Crystal growth and magnetic behavior of CeCl3 (Ce, arXiv)

  27. 2207.00789 Robust magnetic order upon ultrafast excitation of an antiferromagnet (arXiv)

  28. 2207.00854 A symmetry principle for gauge theories with fractons (arXiv)

  29. 2207.01120 Chiral surface spin textures in Cu$_2$OSeO$_3$ unveiled by soft x-ray scattering in specular reflection geometry (arXiv)

  30. 2207.01359 Recipe for higher-order topology on the triangular lattice (Cano, arXiv)

  31. 2207.01416 Moire-driven multiferroic order in twisted CrCl$_3$, CrBr$_3$ and CrI$_3$ bilayers (Lado, arXiv)

  32. 2207.01471 Mottness in 2-dimensional van der Waals Nb$_3$X$_8$ (JPHu, arXiv)

  33. 2207.00266 Comparative study of the charge order in the undoped infinite-layer nickelate superconductors (arXiv)

  34. 2207.00483 Contribution of Collective Excitations to Third Harmonic Generation in Multiband Superconductors: the case of MgB$_2$ (MgB2, arXiv)

  35. 2207.00096 Magnetic order in a coherent two-dimensional Kondo lattice (arXiv)

  36. 2207.00145 Fully-gapped superconducting state in interstitial-carbon-doped Zr5Pt3 (arXiv)

  37. 2207.00184 Fingerprints of nematicity and competing orders in the infinite-layer nickelate (arXiv)

  38. 2207.00250 Ferromagnetic diagonal stripe states in the two-dimensional Hubbard model with $U\lesssim\infty$ (VMC, arXiv)

  39. 2207.00365 Superexchange and Spin-Orbit Coupling in Mono and Bilayer Chromium Trihalides (CrI3, arXiv)

  40. 2207.00382 Evolution of magnetic phase in two dimensional van der Waals Mn$_{1-x}$Ni$_x$PS$_3$ single crystals (arXiv)

  41. 2206.09347 Enhancement of spin mixing conductance by $s$-$d$ orbital hybridization in heavy metals (arXiv)

  42. 2207.00020 Nonsymmorphic Symmetry Protected Dirac, Mobius, and Hourglass Fermions in Topological Materials (arXiv)
